title: A memo calls problems within Gainesville's finance department "Extreme" - mycbs4.com
content: A memo calls problems within Gainesville's finance department "Extreme"  mycbs4.com
description: "The risk of overspending budget is extremely high," a letter alerting Gainesville's Interim City Manager reads, "There is not a quick fix or an easy solution. " The letter raises serious concerns about the state of the city's finance department and ability to accurately report financial statement. The GRU Chief Financial Officer and a partner from a local accounting firm wrote the letter, dated March 10, to Gainesville's Interim City Manager and the GRU General Manager.
